modName: Blood dragon armor - Ebony Armor Reskin
summary: A simple reskin of ebony armor to look similiar to Blood Dragon Armor From Dragon Age 1 and Mass Effect 2
descriptionHtml:
By Fr0z3n (aka nightsfrost)

A simple reskin of ebony armor to look similiar to Blood Dragon Armor From Dragon Age 1 and Mass Effect 2

---INSTALLATION---
To install, place the accompanying data folder into steamapps/common/skyrim
Press yes, you want to merge.

---UN-INSTILLATION---
To uninstall, just go to steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/armor and remove the ebonyarmor folder. This is a clean uninstall.

Do no redistribute, without permission, etc. etc.
author: nightsfrost

files.name: Ebony Armor Reskin - Blood Dragon Armor
files.fileName: Ebony Armor Reskin - Blood Dragon Armor-4377-1-0.zip
